avatar.name: The Dahlia
avatar.description:
The sweet dream burned down the Ever-Flame Mansion, taking with it every trace of "her."
Destruction, Remembrance... flowers of betrayal bloomed wherever they passed.
To return to the dreamscape no one remembers, who will be the one to set her aflame again?

skills.name: Fiddle... Fissured Memory
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of The Dahlia's ATK to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Lick... Enkindled Betrayal
skills.description:
Deploys a Zone that lasts for **2[i]** turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of The Dahlia's turn. Then, deals Fire DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of The Dahlia's ATK to one designated enemy and their adjacent targets.
While the Zone lasts, increases all allies' Weakness Break Efficiency by **3[i]%**. Toughness Reduction taken by enemy targets while not **Weakness Broken** can also be converted into **Super Break DMG**.

skills.name: Wallow... <unbreak>Entombed Ash</unbreak>
skills.description:
Inflicts a "Wilt" state on all enemies, lasting for **2[i]** turn(s). Then, deals Fire DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of The Dahlia's ATK, which is distributed evenly across all enemies.
Enemy targets in the "Wilt" state have their DEF reduced by ****3[f1]%**** and will be implanted with Weakness of all Dance Partners' Types.

skills.name: Who's Afraid of Constance?
skills.description:
When entering combat, The Dahlia regenerates **4[i]** Energy and becomes "Dance Partners" along with the teammate that triggered combat. Whenever there is no other "Dance Partner" on the field, this unit and the teammate with the highest Break Effect become "Dance Partners" together. After a "Dance Partner" attacks a **Weakness Broken** enemy target, the Toughness Reduction from this attack will be converted into 1 instance of **Super Break DMG** at ****5[i]%****.
After an enemy target gets attacked by the other "Dance Partner," The Dahlia launches **Follow-Up ATK** and deals **2[i]** instance(s) of DMG, each dealing Fire DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of The Dahlia's ATK to one random enemy. After each instance of DMG dealt to a **Weakness Broken** enemy target, the Toughness Reduction from this DMG will be converted into 1 instance of **Super Break DMG** at ****3[i]%****.
This effect can only trigger once per turn. If the target is defeated before the **Follow-Up ATK** is used, it will be launched at one random enemy instead.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and after entering combat, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: The Heart Makes the Finest Tomb
skills.description:
After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for **1[i]** second(s). Enemies within this dimension will not actively attack ally targets. After entering combat with enemies in the Special Dimension, The Dahlia immediately deploys her Skill's Zone, and converts the combat-triggering Toughness Reduction into 1 instance of **Super Break DMG** at **2[i]%** against enemy targets that are **Weakness Broken**.
Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

tree.name: Fiddle... Fissured Memory
tree.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of The Dahlia's ATK to one designated enemy.

tree.name: Lick... Enkindled Betrayal
tree.description:

While the Zone lasts, increases all allies' Weakness Break Efficiency by **3[i]%**. Toughness Reduction taken by enemy targets while not **Weakness Broken** can also be converted into **Super Break DMG**.

After a "Dance Partner" attacks a **Weakness Broken** enemy target, the Toughness Reduction from this attack will be converted into 1 instance of **Super Break DMG** at ****5[i]%****.
After an enemy target gets attacked by the other "Dance Partner," The Dahlia launches **Follow-Up ATK** and deals **2[i]** instance(s) of DMG, each dealing Fire DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of The Dahlia's ATK to one random enemy. After each instance of DMG dealt to a **Weakness Broken** enemy target, the Toughness Reduction from this DMG will be converted into 1 instance of **Super Break DMG** at ****3[i]%****.
This effect can only trigger once per turn. If the target is defeated before the **Follow-Up ATK** is used, it will be launched at one random enemy instead.

tree.name: The Heart Makes the Finest Tomb
tree.description:
After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for **1[i]** second(s). Enemies within this dimension will not actively attack ally targets. After entering combat with enemies in the Special Dimension, The Dahlia immediately deploys her Skill's Zone, and converts the combat-triggering Toughness Reduction into 1 instance of **Super Break DMG** at **2[i]%** against enemy targets that are **Weakness Broken**.
Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

tree.name: Yet Another Funeral
tree.description: When entering combat, increases other characters' Break Effect by an amount equal to **24%** of The Dahlia's Break Effect plus **50%**, lasting for **1** turn(s). When The Dahlia receives healing or a Shield provided by a teammate, this effect triggers again, lasting for **3** turn(s). Cannot trigger repeatedly within one turn.

tree.name: Lament, Lost Soul
tree.description: When using Talent's **Follow-Up ATK**, recovers 1 Skill Point for allies. For every **2** instance(s) of Talent's **Follow-Up ATK** used, this effect can trigger once.

tree.name: Outgrow the Old, Espouse the New
tree.description: When an ally target adds Weakness to an enemy target, increases SPD by **30%** for **2** turn(s). If a Fire ally character has implanted a Weakness when using an attack, then after the attack, additionally deals a fixed amount of **20** Fire Toughness Reduction to every target implanted with Weakness. Also, regenerates Energy equal to **10%** of Max Energy. This effect can regenerate Energy up to **50%** of Max Energy.

ranks.name: When a Bud Readies to Bloom
ranks.description: The <u>Super Break DMG</u> multiplier provided by Talent to "Dance Partners" now applies to all ally characters, with "Dance Partners" additionally receiving a <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> boost. After "Dance Partners" use an attack, additionally deals the attacked enemy targets a fixed amount of Toughness Reduction equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of their Max Toughness (minimum <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>, maximum <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak>). This effect can only trigger once per enemy target, and this trigger count resets after the enemy target receives a killing blow.

ranks.name: Fresh, Ethereal, and Beloved
ranks.description: When The Dahlia is on the field, decreases all enemies' All-Type RES by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When an enemy target enters the field, immediately inflicts "Wilt" on them, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

ranks.name: Pity Its Petals Thin as Mist
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Pity Its Heart Gnawed by Worms
ranks.description: Increases the number of DMG instances dealt by Talent's <u>Follow-Up ATK</u> by <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak>. Upon its use, the DMG taken by all enemy targets increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

ranks.name: Fallen, Decayed, and Despised
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: And Yet, Always, Deathly Beautiful
ranks.description: Increases Dance Partners' Break Effect by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When using Talent's <u>Follow-Up ATK</u>, <u>advances the next action</u> of all "Dance Partners" by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

avatar.name: Cyrene
avatar.description:
A meteor streaks across the night sky, stirring ripples in the river of life, shimmering with thirteen hues.
Daughter of Aedes Elysiae, nurturer of the Chrysos Heir of "," plants the Seed of Memory, letting yesterday's flowers bloom in tomorrow
**"Now, let's write a different kind of poem together"**

skills.name: Lo, Hope Takes Flight!
skills.description: Gains **2[i]** "Recollection" point(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Cyrene's Max HP to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Bloom, Elysium of Beyond
skills.description: Gains **3[i]** "Recollection" point(s) and deploys a Zone that lasts for **2[i]** turns. The Zone's duration decreases by 1 at the start of Cyrene's every turn. While the Zone lasts, for each instance of DMG dealt by all ally targets, deals 1 additional instance of **True DMG** equal to ****1[i]%**** of the original DMG. When Cyrene is **downed**, the Zone will also be dispelled.

skills.name: Verse  Vow
skills.description:
**Summons memosprite** Demiurge, causes it to immediately gain 1 **extra turn**, and activates all teammates' Ultimate. Then, enters the "Ripples of Past Reverie" state. Enhances Basic ATK to "To Love and Tomorrow " and can only use this Basic ATK. Increases Cyrene's and Demiurge's CRIT Rate by ****3[i]%****, and deploys the Zone effect from Skill with no duration limit.
Can only be used once per battle. Demiurge's initial Max HP equals to **1[i]%** of Cyrene's Max HP.

skills.name: Hearts Gather as One
skills.description: When combat begins or after Cyrene takes action, other ally characters under any state and their memosprites gain "Future." When ally targets with "Future" take action, consumes "Future" to grant Cyrene **1[i]** "Recollection" point(s). When Cyrene has **4[i]** "Recollection" points, can activate Ultimate and dispel all **debuffs** on her. When she has **5[i]** "Recollection" points during the "Ripples of Past Reverie" state, can activate Ultimate. After reaching the maximum, it can overflow by up to **3[i]** points. While Cyrene is on the field, increases DMG dealt by all ally targets by ****2[f1]%****.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and after entering combat, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Peace at West Wind's End
skills.description: After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for **1[i]** second(s) around the character. Enemies within this Special Dimension enter the "This Moment, Forever" state. While in this state, enemies will cease all actions. Ally characters within this Special Dimension have **2[i]%** increased movement speed. After entering combat within the duration, deploys the Skill's Zone. Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

skills.name: To Love and Tomorrow
skills.description:
Gains **2[i]** "Recollection" points and deals Ice DMG equal to ****3[i]%**** of Cyrene's Max HP to one designated enemy. Then, deals Ice DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Cyrene's Max HP to all enemies.
"To Love and Tomorrow " cannot recover Skill Points.

skills.name: <unbreak>Reunion at</unbreak> <unbreak>First Sight</unbreak>
skills.description: Enables Demiurge to immediately gain 1 **extra turn**.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Attacks an enemy, and after entering combat, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

tree.name: Lo, Hope Takes Flight!
tree.description: Gains **2[i]** "Recollection" point(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Cyrene's Max HP to one designated enemy.

Ally characters within this Special Dimension have **2[i]%** increased movement speed. After entering combat within the duration, deploys the Skill's Zone. Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

tree.name: Child of Remembrance
tree.description: When a teammate's memosprite is summoned, it gains "Future." "Future" held by the memosprite won't be consumed.

tree.name: Ripples Across Time
tree.description: When there are 1/2/3 **Chrysos Heir** or Remembrance characters (excluding Cyrene) in the team, Cyrene gains **2**/**3**/**6** "Recollection" point(s) respectively at the start of combat.

tree.name: Causality in Trichotomy
tree.description: When Cyrene's SPD is **180** or higher, increases all allies' DMG dealt by **20%**. Then, for every 1 SPD that exceeds **180**, increases Cyrene's and Demiurge's Ice **RES PEN** by **2%**. Up to a maximum of **60** excess SPD can be taken into account for this effect.

ranks.name: Epics, Born on a Blank Slate
ranks.description: When Demiurge triggers the Memosprite Skill "Ode to Ego" during the use of "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes," gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> "Recollection" point(s) and increases the number of bounces for this attack by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.

ranks.name: A Tomorrow in Thirteen Shades
ranks.description: When entering combat, additionally gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> "Recollection" point(s). For every 1 different ally character that gains the Memosprite Skill <u>buff</u> from Demiurge, the DMG multiplier for the <u>True DMG</u> dealt by ally targets via the Skill's Zone increases by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>, up to a max increase of <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak>.

ranks.name: By Thy Being, As I've Written
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nMemosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Please Write On, With a Smile
ranks.description: After every 1 use of "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes" by Demiurge, the Bounce DMG multiplier for the triggered Memosprite Skill "Ode to Ego" increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> in the current battle, stacking up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> times.

ranks.name: Gaze, Steeped in Yesterbloom
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.\nMemosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Remembrance, Sung in Ripples
ranks.description: When Cyrene uses Ultimate for the first time, all allies <u>advance action</u> by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. Each time Demiurge triggers the Memosprite Skill "Ode to Ego" during the use of "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes," gains the following effects based on the number of times it has been triggered in the current battle:\n1 time: When Demiurge is on the field, reduces all enemy targets' DEF by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.\n2 times and more: All allies <u>advance action</u> by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

avatar.name: Sparxie
avatar.description:
Like! Follow! Stream! Views! Party till the world ends!
Sparxie and Sparkle, the Mask and the Fool are fundamentally the same.
Whoever is seen, whoever is liked, is the correct answer!

skills.name: Cat Got Your Flametongue?
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Sparxie's ATK to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Boom! Sparxicle's Poppin'
skills.description: Start a livestream to turn Basic ATK into "Bloom! Winner Takes All" and trigger "Engagement Farming" 1 time. During this ability, "Engagement Farming" can be triggered repeatedly, up to ****1[i]**** time(s). Using this ability is not considered as using a Skill.

skills.name: Party's Wildin' and Camera's Rollin'
skills.description: Gains ****1[i]**** Punchline point(s). Deals Fire DMG equal to (****3[f1]****  Elation + ****2[f1]%****) of Sparxie's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: Sleight of Sparx Hand
skills.description: When Sparxie holds "Certified Banger": Using Enhanced Basic ATK deals ****3[i]%**** Fire Elation DMG to one designated enemy, and ****4[f1]%**** Fire Elation DMG to their adjacent targets. Additionally, for every 1 instance of "Engagement Farming" triggered, the Enhanced Basic ATK deals 1 extra instance of ****1[f1]%**** Fire Elation DMG to 1 random attacked enemy target. Using Ultimate deals ****2[i]%**** Fire Elation DMG to all enemies.

skills.name: Content Monetization
skills.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat via actively attacking a "Blocked" enemy, deals Fire DMG to all enemies equal to ****2[i]%**** of Sparxie's ATK and recovers ****1[i]**** Skill Point(s) for allies.

skills.name: Signal Overflow: The Great Encore!
skills.description: Deals ****2[f1]%**** Fire Elation DMG to all enemies and deals ****3[i]**** additional instance(s) of DMG. Each instance deals ****1[f1]%**** Fire Elation DMG to one random enemy. Grants ****4[i]**** "Thrill" point(s) to Sparxie.

ranks.name: #GoingViral #WhoIsShe
ranks.description: When Aha Instant ends, gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> <u>Punchline</u>. For every 1 <u>Punchline</u> owned, increases <u>All-Type RES PEN</u> for all allies by <unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak>, up to a max increase of <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

ranks.name: #AudienceKnows
ranks.description: When Aha Instant ends, Sparxie gains 1 <u>extra turn</u> and <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> "Thrill." For every 1 "Thrill" consumed, increases this unit's CRIT DMG by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s) and stacking up to <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> time(s).

ranks.name: #LinkUp #HeartSkip
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.\nElation Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: #LockedIn #FaceCard
ranks.description: When using Ultimate, additionally gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> <u>Punchline</u> and increases this unit's Elation by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

ranks.name: #HealingTheWorld #GoodVibesOnly
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nElation Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

ranks.name: #BuiltDifferent #GoingExtinct
ranks.description: Increases All-Type <u>RES PEN</u> by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>. For every <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> <u>Punchline</u> taken into account by the Elation Skill, the number of its additional DMG instances increases by 1, up to a max of <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.

avatar.name: Yao Guang
avatar.description:
Mysterious, bold, radical... her quest for change is stunning.
With the "eye" of The Hunt, she sees all fates. Though she knows fate is immutable, the Seer Strategist still walks into danger alone.
With the odds stacked against her, how can she possibly change her destiny?

skills.name: Whistlebolt Sings Joy
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to ****1[i]%**** of Yao Guang's ATK to one designated enemy and Physical DMG equal to ****2[i]%**** of Yao Guang's ATK to targets adjacent to it. The Energy regenerated from Basic ATK increases to 30.

skills.name: Decalight Unveils All
skills.description: Deploys a Zone for ****1[i]**** turn(s). While the Zone is active, increases all allies' Elation by an amount equal to ****2[f1]%**** of Yao Guang's Elation. After Yao Guang uses Basic ATK or Skill, gains ****3[i]**** <u>Punchline</u>.

skills.name: Hexagram of Feathered Fortune
skills.description: Gains ****1[i]**** <u>Punchline</u>. <u>Aha</u> immediately gains 1 <u>extra turn</u> where a fixed amount of ****4[i]**** <u>Punchline</u> is taken into account. This turn, does not consume <u>Punchline</u>, and increases all allies' All-Type <u>RES PEN</u> by ****2[f1]%**** for ****3[i]**** turn(s).

skills.name: Behold Wherever Light Unfolds
skills.description: When Yao Guang holds "<u>Certified Banger</u>": After an ally target uses an attack, triggers "Great Boon," dealing 1 additional instance of ****1[f1]%**** <u>Elation DMG</u> of the corresponding Type to 1 random hit target. If this attack consumes Skill Points, additionally triggers "Great Boon" 1 time. If the attacker's Elation is lower than Yao Guang's, this instance takes Yao Guang's Elation into calculation.

skills.name: Untethered Glimmer Sails Far
skills.description: After using Technique, automatically triggers Skill 1 time at the start of the next battle without consuming Skill Points. When Yao Guang is in the team, breaking destructible objects immediately grants Fortune Pouch, up to ****1[i]**** within every Earth Week.

skills.name: Let Thy Fortune Burst in Flames
skills.description: Inflicts "Woe's Whisper" on all enemies for ****4[i]**** turn(s), increasing DMG taken by ****3[f1]%****. Deals ****2[i]%**** Physical <u>Elation DMG</u> to all enemies, then deals ****5[i]**** instance(s) of ****6[i]%**** Physical <u>Elation DMG</u> to one random enemy.

ranks.name: Chuckle Chimes Where Jade Falls
ranks.description: In <u>Aha's</u> <u>extra turn</u>, the fixed amount of <u>Punchline</u> increases to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>. When targets deal <u>Elation DMG</u>, ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the target's DEF.

ranks.name: Blind Arrows Guided by Feathers
ranks.description: While the Zone is active, increases all ally targets' SPD by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>, and additionally increases Elation by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

ranks.name: Auspices Mirrored In Decalight
ranks.description: Skill Lv. +2, Basic ATK Lv. +1, Elation Skill Lv. +1.

ranks.name: Threads of Fate Colored by Plumes
ranks.description: In <u>Aha's</u> <u>extra turn</u> triggered by Ultimate, the DMG dealt by all ally characters' Elation Skill becomes <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the original DMG.

ranks.name: Bejeweled in Radiant Grace
ranks.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, Talent Lv. +2, Elation Skill Lv. +1.

ranks.name: Ferried Along the Astral Arc
ranks.description: All ally targets' <u>Elation DMG</u> <u>merrymakes</u> by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. Increases the DMG multiplier of Yao Guang's Elation Skill by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of its original multiplier.

weapon.name: Sneering
weapon.refinements: When Aha Instant is activated, the wearer's Elation increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>, lasting until Aha Instant ends.

weapon.name: Lingering Tears
weapon.refinements: When Punchline is <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> or more, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>.

weapon.name: Mushy Shroomy's Adventures
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's Elation by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer uses an Elation Skill, increases Elation DMG taken by all enemies by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

weapon.name: Today's Good Luck
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer uses an Elation Skill, increases Elation by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, stacking up to <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> times.

weapon.name: Fly Into a Pink Tomorrow
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When equipped by Trailblazer (Remembrance), increases all ally targets' DMG dealt by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> and increases the DMG dealt by the Enhanced Basic ATK "Together, We Script Tomorrow!" by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>.

weapon.name: Never Forget Her Flame
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When entering combat, increases Break DMG dealt by the wearer and another teammate who triggered combat by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. If there is no teammate who triggered combat, applies this effect to the wearer and the teammate with the highest Break Effect. Effects of the same type cannot be stacked. When the wearer applies Weakness to an enemy target, recovers 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once. And resets this trigger count when using Ultimate.

weapon.name: This Love, Forever
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's SPD by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer's memosprite uses Memosprite Skill on one ally, gains "Blank," which increases DMG taken by all enemies by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer's memosprite uses Memosprite Skill on an enemy, gains "Verse," which increases CRIT DMG of all allies by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer's memosprite has both "Blank" and "Verse," increases the effects of both "Blank" and "Verse" by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>.

weapon.name: Dazzled by a Flowery World
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. While the wearer is on the field, for every 1 Elation character in the team, increases the Skill Point upper limit by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>, up to a max increase of <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak>. For every 1 Skill Point the wearer consumes, enables the Elation DMG dealt by this unit to ignore <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#6[f1]%</unbreak></color> of enemy targets' DEF, stacking up to <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> times. If <unbreak>#7[i]</unbreak> or more Skill Points are consumed in the same turn, the wearer gains "Stream Promo," which increases all allies' Elation by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>. Light Cone effects of the same type cannot stack.

weapon.name: When She Decided to See
weapon.refinements: Increases the wearer's SPD by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer enters combat or uses Ultimate on an ally target, the wearer gains "Great Fortune" for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s). While the wearer holds "Great Fortune," all allies' CRIT Rate increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, CRIT DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>, and the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color>.\nAt the start of each wave, the wearer regenerates a fixed amount of <unbreak>#6[i]</unbreak> Energy.

item.name: Deep Immersifier
item.description: Quickly extract Planar Ornament in the Interastral Peace Guide

item.name: As Tomorrow Became Yesterday
item.description: Letter in Memory

item.name: Radiant Prominence
item.description: An alien crown left behind by the Noontide Gryphon. Can be used for Ascension of Fire characters.

item.name: Vanquished Flow's Reticence
item.description: Advanced level-up material for Traces.

item.name: Flawed Recollection
item.description: A flawed, fragile crystalline flower of Remembrance. It can be used to superimpose the Light Cone "Fly Into a Pink Tomorrow."

item.name: Access Card
item.description: Can be used to open the Relic Chest in the mysterious collection at Herta Space Station.

item.name: We're the Champions
item.description: Chat Box for Message and Chat. Once obtained, they can be used in the Message or Chat functions

item.name: Deliverer's Wreath
item.description: A wreath that Amphoreus offered to {NICKNAME.

item.name: Garbdriver
item.description: A hairpin modeled after one of Ruan Mei's creations.

item.name: Hello Mem World!
item.description: A plush, Mem-styled hood.

item.name: Gold Coin
item.description: The core economic resource in Currency Wars gameplay, used for purchasing squad members, increasing Experience, and refreshing the Store.

item.name: Equivalent Banknote
item.description: Obtained through Currency Wars gameplay, can be used to activate "Advantage Layout."

item.name: Ascension Points
item.description: Obtained through Currency Wars gameplay, can be used to increase your "Ascension Level."

item.name: Experience
item.description: Experience material used to increase the team's size in Currency Wars. Automatically gains 2 points after clearing each Node. Can also be purchased with Gold Coins

item.name: Free Refresh
item.description: A resource used to refresh the Store in Currency Wars. When this resource is available, refreshing the Store will not consume Gold Coins.

item.name: Chrysos Invitation Ticket
item.description: A special invitation ticket for the "Chimera World Tournament" that unlocks chimera trainers you want to fight alongside with in the selection interface. It can be earned by participating in the tournament.

item.name: Bounce-Bounce Snack
item.description: A special snack beloved by all creations. Can be used to cheer for creations in the "Snack Dash" event and exchange for rewards.

item.name: Zagreus' Premium Honey Curd
item.description: Upon use, immediately regenerates **25%** of Max Energy for one designated ally.

item.name: Zagreus' Premium Bread Crisps
item.description: Upon use, immediately heals one designated ally by **20%** of their Max HP plus **240** extra HP.

item.name: Zagreus' Premium Viscorpus
item.description: Upon use, increases Ice DMG of all allies by **20%** for the next battle.

item.name: Zagreus' Premium Red Beans
item.description: Upon use, increases DEF of all allies by **30%** for the next battle.

relics.name: Last West Wind of Amphoreus
relics.description: Encapsulated in the Planar Sphere is a chapter named An Eternal Page from As I've Written. It has been imbued with the fragrance of flowers, the warmth of the west wind... and an open ending.
relics.two: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by **8%**. While the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases all allies' SPD by **8%**. This effect cannot be stacked.
relics.twos: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by **8%**.
story: There is no eternal tranquility in this world. Even the dawn held high by Kephale will fade. Eternity exists only within warm memories. In this thin page of The Eternal Land slumbers all the memories of Amphoreus's thirty million cycles, where infinite yesterdays piled into infinite tomorrows. It is a peaceful paradise, the end of the west wind, and a sprouting thread of memory yet to bud. Under a rosy-hued sky with no more snowstorms, bitter cold, or sudden rain, silver shallow beaches are covered in flower petals. Those who were swept away by the waves of history have found refuge in peaceful dwellings. In their long leisure, people began to create dances never-before-seen and write plays never-before-told. In the misty bathhouses, people speak of heroes, while stars, wars, and refugees seem like distant memories. They marvel at the hazy lives they once led: Today's chefs were yesterday's scholars, and those who were once strangers have now become companions. Those once known as the Chrysos Heirs, their journey of loss finally comes to an end. The Goldweaver's eyes once again treasure beauty, the Holy Maiden's hands no longer bear death's cold touch, the fleet-footed thief runs only for happiness, and the physician need not weep for patients anymore. The crown prince of Kremnos feels the warmth of home, just as the white-haired boy from Aedes Elysiae still remembers the scorching flames of war that consumed his homeland. Yet upon waking from this grand dream, his parents are measuring his height while gently patting his head. Sometimes, they would pass through the corridor dividing day and night, where the dazzling cosmos seemed within arm's reach. The sages of the Grove would often linger here to observe, while red-haired children loved to imagine shooting stars as the Astral Express during a warp. During festivals, the singer of the ocean would sing tales of the Nameless' adventures to everyone. The female ruler known as the Imperator would always raise a glass of honey brew in blessing to the heroes while gazing at distant worlds... The seeds of the future have yet to sprout, while fallen petals of the past have already blanketed into a warm sea of flowers. In a fleeting moment while traversing the stars, the Nameless might feel those anticipating gazes. This page of eternity, carried by the wings of Trailblaze, may yet have the chance to turn to its next chapter. As for what those old friends left unsaid, members of the Nameless already understand. "...and you shall carry our story forward, into tomorrow."

relics.name: Eternal Verses of Amphoreus
relics.description: At the story's end, the data of thirty million cycles transforms into a complete poem, and the years written by the Recorder will remain in the cosmic memory, never fading away.
relics.two: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by **8%**. While the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases all allies' SPD by **8%**. This effect cannot be stacked.
relics.twos: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by **8%**.
story: The poem named Amphoreus, where time acts as its pages, and chaos marks its beginning. The golden blood engraves the footprints of defiance, as the heroes of the Flame-Chase lead the way in the grand enterprise of genesis. The chapter of "Passage," enlightening messages of salvation, a thousand tomorrows rising in succession. The chapter of "Law," wagering against the gods, all for the world to stand among the stars. The chapter of "Ocean," though waves may break, resisting against the void for a thousand years. The chapter of "Romance," leading the Flame-Chase Journey, weaving the future with golden threads. The chapter of "Strife," a path of blood and fire, where scars write of solitary glory. The chapter of "Trickery," truth wrapped in lies, preserving light within the Evernight. The chapter of "Life and Death," embracing lost souls, keeping the cycle of life and death eternal. The chapter of "Reason," life cast into flames, as souls question the world's truth. The chapter of "Sky," healing hearts with faint light, mending dawn and dusk with human will. The chapter of "Worldbearing," rage burning away the cage, the hero bringing forth the light of Dawn. The chapter of "Earth," forging the blood of Permanence, sheltering the wandering creatures of the land. The chapter of "Time," watching over countless pasts, dedicating memories that shall not fade into oblivion. ... Through thirty million cycles, a girl held her pen, nurturing the naive "heart" with memories, as thirteen hues finally merged into the color of "love." When shooting stars streaked across the sky, a hero from beyond the sky took up the pen, embarking once again with companions on the Flame-Chase Journey, writing an unprecedented ending through the way of the Trailblaze. At the story's end, blossoms flourished in the eternal Pure Land. On one end where night lingers, starlights twinkled. On the other end where day shines, people rubbed their eyes and awakened. As the west wind gently brushed past, people greeted each other good morning, just as they had done through thirty million cycles. Here, the story draws its final period, like a blazing sun that's no longer blinding, like the Compass of the Trailblaze, and like an eye filled with love. "In this world, they fused burning golden ichor into their bodies. Will destiny remember their names in the days to come?" Now, the poem's question has found its answer. The memories that awaken at dawn will never forget. Amphoreus, that is its name.

relics.name: Livestream's Protean Vistas
relics.description: The Planar Sphere encapsulates countless streaming windows in its digital space. It's a virtual society deeply interwoven with reality, a fantastical yet detached imaginary metropolis, an alternate life that anyone can peek into and participate within.
relics.two: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **16%**. If **3** or more Skill Points are consumed in the same turn, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **32%**, lasting for **3** turns.
relics.twos: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **16%**.
story: [...logging in...] riddle posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 02:16 It's Hanami's birthday stream today, but why does it feel like we just celebrated it last month? I'm on Fire! posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 02:18 She claims her birthday is on August 73rd... Try finding THAT on a calendar! Voice of 873 posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 02:20 Hanami updated her status: "Wow! So many gifts! Thank you everyone! Also, if possible, please help clear out Hanami's wishlist~ Love ya " riddle posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 02:21 I know she's trying to drain my wallet dry! But you know what? I'm totally cool with it~ My dear Hanami~ My precious Hanami~ [Replying to riddle] KappaKami posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 02:26 You're that person who was just online, aren't you? All those gifts you're sending, you're just trying to make yourself into a top fan, right? Our Hanami already has her own fanbase, so stop trying to force your way in. You think I can't look up your ID? You're a lawless thug, a criminal. You think I don't know that? You're pretending to be a Hanami fan like us, but you're really just trying to build up a fanbase to cash in on her popularity and trending status. Get out of the stream! [Replying to KappaKami] riddle posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 02:41 Who are you to talk? What's it to you? At least I showed up for the livestream. What have YOU been doing? I'm on Fire! posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 02:45 ...Are there only Hanami stans in this forum? No haters around? If you're a fan, head straight to the livestream channel! [Replying to I'm on Fire!] \(^o^)/~ posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 03:00 I'm a hardcore anti-fan! We need to make a plan to really mess with her and her fans. Not just get her canceled, but get her arrested! I've DMed you the group chat link [Replying to \(^o^)/~] I'm on Fire! posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 03:02 I've joined several anti-fan groups. We act like bros normally, but the moment something happens, they bicker internally. Heh, I'm done with this. Voice of 873 posted on Aug 7 (Fri) 03:03 Hanami updated her status: "Nami-nami, nighty-niiiight" [...logging off.] As the night draws to an end, digital nomads in cyberspace peer around curiously, exchanging fragmented discussions and offering ambiguous stances. Ultimately, none will be remembered... Virtual characters celebrate virtual birthdays, as virtual chaos seeps into chaotic reality.

relics.name: Livestream's Chatter Banter
relics.description: The Tengoku@Livestream might not be heaven. The countless messages flooding the chat windows can build glory or bring destruction, as it was never an isolation from reality, but rather an extension of it.
relics.two: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **16%**. If **3** or more Skill Points are consumed in the same turn, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **32%**, lasting for **3** turns.
relics.twos: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **16%**.
story: [...logging in...] HanamiLover4Life posted on Aug 10 (Mon) 23:22 This is bad! That birthday livestream for Hanami was fake! I wasted my money for nothing! Everyone else got scammed too! [Replying to HanamiLover4Life] Am I a God posted on Aug 10 (Mon) 23:24 From what I can gather: Earlier, a hacker uploaded a "RAM Sleep Command" to Hanami's livestream, secretly copying all of Hanami's private data to third-party cloud server nodes without her noticing. In short, that night, Hanami spent the evening chatting with fake comments, while real viewers were interacting with pre-recorded stream content. Today, Hanami discovered her money hadn't come through, and realized the hacker had made off with her streaming revenue from two days ago. [Replying to Am I a God] Tech Guru posted on Aug 10 (Mon) 23:28 No way, none of the real-time comments showed up? Didn't Hanami notice that all the comments were fake? Voice of 873 posted on Aug 10 (Mon) 23:33 Hanami updated her status: "Nami-nami, I'm so mad! () I've called the police. This is financial fraaaud!" [Replying to Tech Guru] HanamiLover4Life posted on Aug 10 (Mon) 23:36 Last time I sent her money, Hanami only said "Thanks for the Super Chat, HanamiLover4Life" and it's the same this time. How was I supposed to know this was reusing the same response from last time!? I can't tell the difference! I really can't! Besides, she always ignores non-paying chat messages... I just thought she wasn't paying attention to me. I'm on Fire! posted on Aug 10 (Mon) 23:50 LMAO, what a cyber heist. Serves her right. Totally deserved. So many people in the livestream pretending to chat normally, but no one dares to call it out. Everyone thinks that if others don't bring up the issue, then there's no issue. [Replying to I'm on Fire!] HanamiLover4Life posted on Aug 11 (Tue) 00:01 I'm done. Never spending money on virtual streamers again. She never really interacted with me, and I can't tell if she was ever sincere... I thought she would respond in real-time to my live comments, but now I see I was just fooling myself. [Replying to HanamiLover4Life] Am I a God posted on Aug 11 (Tue) 00:15 Don't be so negative, bro. Sure, you got scammed out of your money, but you were happy that day. Does it really matter if that Hanami was real or not? Voice of 873 posted on Aug 11 (Tue) 00:17 Hanami updated her status: "Nami-nami, I can't sleep! Come hang out with me in my livestream~" [Replying to Am I a God] HanamiLover4Life posted on Aug 11 (Tue) 00:18 You've got a point there, bro. I'm off to watch the stream. [...logging off.] The livestream countdown begins, as the viewer count climbs steadily. Digital wanderers with mixed emotions stir once again as another wild and sensational broadcast is about to begin... True feelings mixed with true lies. Truth here ain't worth a dime.

relicSets.name: Ever-Glorious Magical Girl
relicSets.four: The Elation DMG dealt by the wearer and their memosprites ignores **10%** of targets' DEF. For every **5** accumulated Punchline allies gain, the Elation DMG dealt additionally ignores **1%** of targets' DEF, stacking up to **10** time(s).
relicSets.fourpc: The Elation DMG dealt by the wearer and their memosprites ignores **1[i]%** of targets' DEF. For every **2[i]** accumulated Punchline allies gain, the Elation DMG dealt additionally ignores **3[i]%** of targets' DEF, stacking up to **4[i]** time(s).

relicSets.name: Diviner of Distant Reach
relicSets.four: Before entering combat, if the wearer's SPD is greater than or equal to **120**/**160**, increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by **10%**/**18%**. When the wearer uses Elation Skill for the first time in each battle, enhances all allies' Elation by **10%**. This effect cannot stack.
relicSets.fourpc: Before entering combat, if the wearer's SPD is greater than or equal to **1[i]**/**2[i]**, increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by **3[i]%**/**4[i]%**. When the wearer uses Elation Skill for the first time in each battle, enhances all allies' Elation by **5[i]%**.

relicSets.name: Amphoreus, The Eternal Land
relicSets.two: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by **8%**. While the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases all allies' SPD by **8%**. This effect cannot be stacked.
relicSets.twopc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by **1[i]%**. While the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases all allies' SPD by **2[i]%**. This effect cannot be stacked.

relicSets.name: Tengoku@Livestream
relicSets.two: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **16%**. If **3** or more Skill Points are consumed in the same turn, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **32%**, lasting for **3** turns.
relicSets.twopc: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **1[i]%**. If **2[i]** or more Skill Points are consumed in the same turn, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by **3[i]%**, lasting for **4[i]** turns.
